title: Samsung 55" 4K Smart TV
shortDescription: Premium 4K Smart TV with HDR support, built-in streaming apps, and voice control. Perfect for living rooms and entertainment centers.
description: Experience stunning 4K resolution with this Samsung Smart TV featuring HDR10+ technology, Crystal Display for vibrant colors, and Tizen OS with built-in Netflix, YouTube, and Prime Video. Includes 3 HDMI ports, WiFi connectivity, and Alexa compatibility.

title: LG 43" Full HD Smart TV
shortDescription: Affordable Full HD Smart TV with webOS, perfect for bedrooms and smaller spaces. Great value for money with essential smart features.
description: Compact and affordable LG Smart TV with Full HD resolution, webOS platform for easy streaming, and ThinQ AI for voice control. Features 2 HDMI ports, built-in WiFi, and access to popular streaming services.

title: Sony 65" 4K OLED TV
shortDescription: Premium OLED TV with exceptional picture quality, perfect blacks, and cinema-grade color accuracy. Ideal for movie enthusiasts and large living rooms.
description: Sony's flagship OLED TV featuring perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and Triluminos Pro color technology. Includes Google TV, Dolby Vision, HDMI 2.1 for gaming, and Acoustic Surface Audio technology.

title: TCL 32" HD Smart TV
shortDescription: Compact and affordable HD Smart TV, perfect for bedrooms, kitchens, or dorm rooms. Basic smart features with popular streaming apps.
description: Budget-friendly TCL Smart TV with HD resolution, Roku TV platform for easy streaming, and compact design perfect for smaller spaces. Includes 2 HDMI ports and built-in WiFi.

title: Hisense 50" 4K Gaming TV
shortDescription: Gaming-optimized 4K TV with low input lag, variable refresh rate, and game mode. Perfect for console gaming and entertainment.
description: Hisense gaming TV featuring 4K resolution, Game Mode Pro with low input lag, Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM). Includes VIDAA smart platform and 4 HDMI ports.
